ROM.Changelog: ### Changelog 20150803 *Fixed 720p HFR (slow-motion) recording at 90FPS and 120FPS *Added support for HSR (high-speed with audio) recording up to 120FPS for 720p and 60FPS for 1080p *Removed option to record 1080p at 90/120FPS (making this work would require modification of the proprietary camera libraries, you need Snapdragon Camera for this) *Fixed focus not working in HDR mode *Reverted WiFi config changes from previous build *Increased earpiece speaker volume *Removed FWVGA camcorder resolution *Re-enabled audio offload for a/v streaming *Relaxed thermal thresholds *A lot of EOS stuff, gonna release full changelog when official build came out (in few days)
